DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the efficacy of Ursofalk 500 mg tablets versus Ursofalk 500 mg capsules in the treatment of Primary Biliary Cirrhosis (PBC).
DOC.brief_title: Ursofalk Tablets (500 mg) Versus Ursofalk Capsules (250 mg) in the Treatment of Primary Biliary Cirrhosis
DOC.criteria: Negative pregnancy Signed informed consent Histologically proven noncirrhotic liver disease histologically proven cirrhosis PBC stage II+IV Positive HIV serology
